entry:
You are the dancing tree,
Old and rough. !amused !talkedtotree

One hundred and seventeen,
dancing tree. !amused
Feel the beat from the tree topsee, oh yeah! !amused

You can dance
You can grow. !amused
Having the root of your life. !amused

Ooh, see that birch
Watch that tribe. !amused
I'll talk to you after you prove you're worthy.
danced: Your little dance amuses me. You're keeping the beat alive! !amused
►There is nothing like putting a smile on a tree's face. How are you? @smile
dare: Oh you pesky human! Can't even take a compliment! @request !end
nothelpful: Oh you gnarly individual. I should have never trusted you in the first place… @request !end
smile: You seem like a decent lad! Maybe you can help me out with something.
►Actually, I was about to ask you for something.
Huh? You came here just for me? How nice! @request
request: What is it that made you come all this way?
►I'd like to humbly ask you for a piece of your wood. @wood
►Maybe we can help each other out.
prank: Go prank somebody else. I'm too old for this. @sure !end
wood: Sure sure. I can spare some. If you help me, you shall have your wood.
sure: I'm an old tree. I don't have any children.
My pine cones never amount to anything…
I could really need your help. With procreation.
►Oh no! What happens to your pine cones? @pinecones
►Nah I'm not really the helpful kind. @nothelpful
pinecones: Well that's a super long story.
But I'll gladly tell you, little one.
lovethat: The only way I can get a son is if you plant one of my pine cones on the mountain in the west. !mountainzoom
Would you do that for me?
weird: Oh you judgemental humanoid! Show some empathy! @request !end
notime: Oh you are not a very helpful life-form! @request !end
nevermind: Oh you rude leafless imposter! Won't even listen to my sad, sad story. @request !end
missinggear: You will need some special gear to be able to climb that mountain. I hereby grant my personal pair of double jump boots!
I'll drop the seed for you now. Good luck on your journey! !spawnseed @reminder !end
cool: So the thing with pine cones, you see, is they need very special fertile ground to grow.
Have you looked down? The soil here is rubbish. Nothing can grow here. No nutrients!
Which, ironically, is why I'm too weak to throw my pine cones far enough onto better grounds.
So I need somebody to carry my pine cone to the best possible place in the area.
I just want my child to have it easier than me, you know?
reminder: You know, you wanted to help me procreate. Bring my cone to the highest place in this area.
►[$seedplanted]I planted the seed. How about the reward? @reward
You did… what? Thank god I have an unlimited supply of them. @reminder !spawnseed !end
reward: You will get a reward when my offspring sprouts. That was the deal.
Ho ho, maybe you can go the extra mile and make the little cone grow faster?
►I'll try... There might be some trick to it. !end @reminder
